question: When do we move into the new space?
answer: We will be moving into our new space on the morning of Monday, November 2nd.

question: When do we leave our old space?
answer: New America IT systems (PCs, phones, printers, and wireless internet) will officially shut down on Wednesday, October 28th, at noon. After that, most staff will need to work remotely.

question: Will I keep my phone number?
When do I no longer have access to my New America phone at 1899 L St?
answer: Wednesday, October 28th, at noon, is the last time you will be available to use your New America phone prior to the move.

question: When will printers be disconnected?
answer: Since most IT infrastructure will be shut down on Wednesday, October 28th, that is the last date you will be able to use printers. Printers will be disconnected.

question: Am I responsible for sending change of address notifications?
